column5: Description :The master course aims to provide qualifications for entry into the professions in the area of robotics, computer vision, image processing and medical imaging either in public laboratory or private research company. Over 4 semesters (120 ECTS), the students attend the University of Bourgogne Franche-Comté in France, where all the classes will be taught in English. VIBOT students are required to cover the areas of studies below, over the total of 120 ECTS:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
